casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jose LEYVA. No. 131P07-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 5, 2009. Catherine F. Jordan, Assistant Attorney General, Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th day of January 2009 by Defendant for Petition for a Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of February 2009."
